issue.title: [C#] Implement ChunkedArray, Column and Table in C#
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4719](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4719). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement "ChunkedArray", "Column" and "Table" in arrow/csharp. They are useful types to represent pieces in a dataset
